info.title: Open Skills API
info.description: A complete and standard data store for canonical and emerging skills, knowledge, abilities, tools, technolgies, and how they relate to jobs.

get.description: Retrieves the names, descriptions, and UUIDs of all job titles.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Pagination offset. Default is 0.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of items per page. Default is 20 and cannot exceed 500.

get.description: Retrieves the names, descriptions, and UUIDs of all job titles matching a given search criteria.

parameters.name: begins_with
parameters.description: Find job titles beginning with the given text fragment

parameters.name: contains
parameters.description: Find job titles containing the given text fragment

parameters.name: ends_with
parameters.description: Find job titles ending with the given text fragment

get.description: Retrieves the canonical job title for a synonymous job title

parameters.name: job_title
parameters.description: Find the canonical job title(s) for jobs matching the given text fragment

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximumn number of job title synonyms to return. Default is 1 and cannot exceed 10.

get.description: Retrieves a list of unusual job titles and the UUIDs of their canonical jobs.
Retrieves the name, description, and UUID of a job by specifying its O*NET SOC Code or UUID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The O*NET SOC Code or UUID of the job title to retrieve

parameters.name: fips
parameters.description: The FIPS Code of a Core-Based Statistical Area. Only return the job if present in this area

get.description: Retrieves a collection of jobs associated with a specified job.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The UUID of the job to retrieve related jobs for

200.description: A job and its related jobs

get.description: Retrieves a collection of skills associated with a specified job.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The UUID of the job to retrieve skills for

200.description: A job and its related skills

get.description: Retrieve the names, descriptions, and UUIDs of all skills.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Pagination offset. Default is 0.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of items per page. Default is 20 and cannot exceed 500.

get.description: Retrieves the names, descriptions, and UUIDs of all skills matching a given search criteria.

parameters.name: begins_with
parameters.description: Find skill names beginning with the given text fragment

parameters.name: contains
parameters.description: Find skill names containing the given text fragment

parameters.name: ends_with
parameters.description: Find skill names ending with the given text fragment

get.description: Retrieves the canonical skill name for a synonymous skill name

parameters.name: skill_name
parameters.description: Find the canonical skill name(s) for skills matching the given text fragment

get.description: Retrieves the name, description, and UUID of a job by specifying its UUID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The UUID of the skill name to retrieve

get.description: Retrieves a collection of jobs associated with a specified skill.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The UUID of the skill to retrieve jobs for

200.description: A skill and its related jobs

get.description: Retrieves a collection of skills associated with a specified skill.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The UUID of the skill to retrieve related skills for

200.description: A skill and its related skills

parent_uuid.description: UUID for the job's parent job category

uuid.description: Universally Unique Identifier for the job

parent_uuid.description: Universally Unique Identifier for the job's canonical job title

uuid.description: Universally Unique Identifier for the job
Universally Unique Identifier for the job

importance.description: O*NET importance score indicating how important skill is to job.

job_uuid.description: Universally Unique Identifier for the job

level.description: O*NET level score indicating the skill level required for the job.

job_title.description: Title of the job associated with the UUID

job_uuid.description: Universally Unique Identifier for the job

normalized_job_title.description: Normalized title of the job associated with the UUID

parent_uuid.description: Universal Unique Identifier for the canonical job title

title.description: Job title for the synonymous job title

uuid.description: Universally Unique Identifier for the synonymous job title
Universally Unique Identifier for the canonical skill name

rel.description: Link descriptor (e.g. self, first, prev, next, last)

uuid.description: Universally Unique Identifier for the skill

skill_uuid.description: Universally Unique Identifier for the skill

normalized_job_title.description: Normalized title of the job associated with the UUID

skill_name.description: Title of the job associated with the UUID

skill_uuid.description: Universally Unique Identifier for the job

uuid.description: Universally Unique Identifier for the skill
Universally Unique Identifier for the skills
